actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that the Secretary of the Treasury shall make certain determinations relating to what gas will be treated as a qualified fuel for purposes of the credit for fuels from nonconventional sources.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require, if the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission stops making determinations on whether any gas is produced from geopressured brine, Devonian shale, coal seams, or a tight formation, that the Secretary of the Treasury make that determination.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that the Secretary of the Treasury shall make certain determinations relating to what gas will be treated as a qualified fuel for purposes of the credit for fuels from nonconventional sources.
